name: Anker HDMI Switch, 4K@60Hz HDMI Switcher, 2 in 1 Out with Smooth Finish, Supports HDR, 3D, Dolby, Compatible with Laptops, PC, Xbox Series, PS5 / PS4, Projector, and More
short_description: HDMI Switching Simplified: Dive directly into your chosen media with a single button for hassle-free transitions between your game or movie without unplugging cables.

- Enjoy 4K Excellence: Turn your regular viewing sessions into cinematic experiences with our HDMI switch that supports resolutions up to 4K@60Hz. Note: to guarantee a 4K60 display, please ensure that both the input and output HDMI cables are shorter than 3.3 feet with 30AWG, and that the combined length does not exceed 6.5 feet.

Huge Compatibility: Seamlessly compatible with a wide range of devices, this HDMI switch integrates everything from laptops and game consoles to TV screens and VR headsets. Note: This switch does not support HDMI CEC.
What You Get: Anker HDMI Switch (2 in 1 Out, 4K HDMI), safety guide, 18-month warranty, and our friendly customer service.

name: 4K HDMI Splitter 1 in 2 Out Mirror Display Not Expand, Dual HDMI Splitter Hub to Dual Monitors Multi-Scree Displays Audio Synchronization, Compatible for MacBook Laptop Desktop PC Graphics Card TV
short_description: HDMI splitter 1 in 2 out for dual monitors. The separator can split a single signal source from a TV box, game console, and PC into two and transmit them to two display devices (such as a TV, monitor, and projector)
HDMI splitter 1 in 2 out extended display and mirrored display (The two signal sources output by the splitter must display the same, but they can be different from other displays)

Supports up to 4K resolution and 30Hz refresh rate, compatible with 2K 60Hz, 1080P 60Hz, 720P 60Hz. The actual displayed resolution is related to your device parameters and display settings, and for the first connection, you may need to actively adjust the relevant setting options.
HDMI splitter 1 in 2 out with audio, audio signal will be synchronized with HDMI signal output, no additional audio cable required!
Easy to use, no need to install drivers! Simply set up to watch videos on two display devices!
product_description: The HDMI splitter can split one HDMI signal into two HDMI signals, which can be connected to two displays and support up to two HDMI signals 4K . Copy One HDMI Signal Into Two It can replicate one HDMI signal to two HDMI signals. Therefore, you can easily obtain two identical monitors. Max 4K Resolution Up to 4K resolution, compatible with 2K, 1080P, 720P. Supports simultaneous output of two 4K@60Hz (Or 2K@60Hz , 1080P@60Hz ) HDMI video signal! The first connection may require selecting the appropriate resolution and refresh rate in the Display Settings>Resolution options. Audio and Video Synchronization Output The audio signal will be output synchronously with the video signal, without the need for additional audio cables. Attention: The HDMI Splitter is 1 in 2 out, not 2 in 1 out. The HDMI separator divides the HDMI signal into two parts, so the two HDMI signals output by the separator are the same. Package: 4K HDMI Splitter X1 4K HDMI Cable 30cm X1 Micro USB Cable X1 User Manual X1 .

name: MT-ViKI HDMI Splitter 1 in 4 Out, 1x4 Power HDMI Splitter 4 Ports w/AC Adapter, 4Kx2K@30Hz 3D Full HD Distributor for PS4 Fire Stick HDTV
short_description: 4K HDMI splitter 1 in 4 out: this hdmi splitter can mirror/duplicate 1 HDMI input source to 4 HD output monitor simultaneously; Warm Reminder: 1. This is a HDMI splitter, not a HDMI switch, you can't switch between devices. 2. Doesn't extend screen, only can mirror screen to multiple monitor.

Resolution: 4 way hdmi splitter supports resolution 4Kx2K@30Hz, Full HD 1080P, 3D, deep color 8/10/12 bit; Supported DTS-HD, Dolby-trueHD, DTS, Dolby-AC3, DSD etc; Plug and play, no software required. Please note that the input/output device must support 4K in order to display 4K resolution.

High Compability: This powered HDMI splitter support output 4K 30 HDCP V1.4, input support: computer, PS3, PS4, Xbox, Blu-ray DVD player, STB any standard HDMI version work with HD TV & monitor with HDMI port.
Cascade Connection: 1x4 HDMI splitter supports cascade for multiple splitters, it can transfer HDMI output signal up to 100ft (Input 40 ft and output 60ft )

Package: HDMI Splitter 1 in 4 out *1, AC Power adapter*1; MT-VIKI also provide HDMI splitter 1 in 2 out, 1 in 4 out, 1 in 8 out, and 1 in 16 out. If no display after connected, pls help to check if connected reversely.

name: Warrky HDMI Splitter 4K, Display Mirror Same Screen Only (Not for Extended Mode), HDMI Splitter 1 in 2 Out [USB-C Powered, Metal Shell, 3.3 Ft Braided Cable], 1x2 for Dual Monitors, Grey-4K UHD
short_description: [HDMI Splitter 1 in 2 out] Please be noted that this HDMI Splitter does not support extend mode, only support mirror mode. Duplicate 4K HDMI signals from a single source to two HDMI displays, with synchronized video and audio. Ideal for enjoying TV shows in different rooms using only one TV box or more dual-screen setups! (Mirror/Duplicate mode only.)

[USB-C Powered for Stable Performance] This HDMI amplifier splitter supports up to 66ft HDMI cable, significantly outperforming the average standard. The included USB-C power cable can be connected to any USB-A device to provide stable performance for Apple products, PS4, or TV boxes. No need for a separate charger. Compact size: 2.1 x 1.8 x 0.5 inches (L x W x H). Weight: 3.8 oz. NOTE: Please power the HDMI Splitter before connecting other HDMI devices.

[Mirror the Same 4K Contents to 2 Screens] This HDMI duplicator support up to UHD 4K@30Hz, QHD 2K@60Hz and FHD 1080P@120Hz. Backward compatible with 480i@60Hz/480p@60Hz/576i@50Hz/576p@50Hz/720p@60Hz/1080i@60Hz/1080p@60Hz. Compliant with HDCP 1.4. Support audio format: DTS-HD/Dobly-true HD/LPCM7.1/DTS/Dobly-AC3/DSD/HD(HBR). ONLY support 4K@60Hz in YCbCr. NOT support CEC, HDR, and VRR.

[Full Metal Casing for Durability] Both ends are covered by aluminum alloy case. Hard to break. Gold-plated HDMI male and female connectors maximize conductivity. Nylon braided cable, never rupture. Ergonomic curve design, easier to grip. Comes with a 3.3ft HDMI Cable, which save you an extra one.

[What's in the Package?] Inside the package, you'll find a 4K HDMI Splitter, a USB-C power cable, and a user guide. All WARRKY products are backed by online support team. If you have any questions regarding this dual hdmi adapter, please consult for fast and responsible support within 18hrs!

name: 4K@60Hz 1x4 HDMI Splitter 1 in 4 Out,4:4:4,18 Gbps,4 Port Powered HDMI 2.0 Splitter Support Auto Down Scaler, 4K 1080P Sync, HDR10,3D, Only Duplication/Mirror Screens (Not Extend) for PS5/Xbox/HDTV
short_description: 4K 1X4 HDMI Splitter -4K@60Hz 4:4:4 18Gbps HDMI 2.0 Splitter 1 in 4 out can Duplication/mirror 1 HDMI source to 4 hdmi displays simultaneously.(4 Display Terminals Displaying The Same Picture )Note:This 4 Port hdmi splitter with power Only Support Duplication/mirror/copy mode (A-AAAA) , Not extend and switch mode, Not Hdmi Switcher, Does Not Support 4 In 1 Out)

4 port hdmi 2.0 splitter with Auto downscaler function:The 4K 1x4 hdmi splitter 1 in 4 out Support 4K to 1080P downscaler function and mixed 4K & 1080p display outputs, Automatically Scale Resolutions to Match your monitor,The 4K video source device can simultaneously display 4K content to 4K monitors and 1080p content to 1080p monitors via downscaling; Note: (not support mixed 2K & 1080p output;not support resolution downscaling from 4K @60Hz “YUV 4:2:2” to 1080p )

4K@60Hz hdmi splitter 1x4 Widly Compability :The 1x4 hdmi 2.0 splitter supports full HD 4Kx2K@60Hz,1080p@120Hz/60Hz,3840x2160@60Hz,1440p@60Hz and 3D resolutions,Works great with Computer、XBox 、PS5、HD TVs、monitors Projector etc,The 4 Port powered hdmi Multi Monitor Outputs splitter Compliant with HDMI 2.0a, HDCP 2.2/1.4 with 18Gbps bandwidth , Plug and Play,no external driver required,no delay, with the HDMI 2.0 cables,provides you an extra long distance for video/audio transmission, which up to 30 ft（Note:Input 30 ft, output 30 ft) .

4 Port powered hdmi splitter Wide Application :This 4 way hdmi plitter with powered support various brands of players and OTT boxescompatible with TV, PS5, Projector, Laptop , Computer, Gaming Console etc; It provides solutions for TV stores, digital entertainment centers, offices, hotels, HDTV retail and display venues, game room and data center control, information distribution, conference room presentations and corporate training environments, home theaters, and more.

LinSeek 2.0 hdmi splitter Package Included:4kx2K@60Hz HDMI Splitter 1X4( hdmi splitter 1 input 4output) 1 pcs;5V/1A Power Adapter 1 pcs ; User Manual 1 pcs. This hdmi splitter with power supply can be widely used in exhibitions, as professional salons,conference rooms, bedrooms, living rooms, kitchens, backyards and multimedia teaching.

name: OREI UltraHD 4K @ 60 Hz 1 X 4 HDMI Splitter 1 in 4 Out 4 Port 4: 8-Bit - HDMI 2.0, HDCP 2.0, 18 Gbps, EDID, Duplicate / Mirror 4K Screens - UHDS-104
short_description: HDMI Splitter 1 in 4 Out: THIS UNIT DOES NOT EXTEND MONITORS - ONLY Split one HDMI input signal to four HDMI output signals identical to the input signal. It is recommended using HDMI cables not exceeding 30 Feet.

4K 18 Gbps Powered HDMI Splitter split one HDMI 2.0 input signal to four HDMI output signals identical to the input signal – Input: 1x HDMI & Outputs: 4x HDMI | Comes with EDID management, 1 in 4 out HDMI Splitter
Supported resolution: up to 4K/60Hz, 1080p, 720p, VGA to WUXGA & Supported Audio: LPCM, Dolby-AC3, DTS7.1, DSD/Dolby TrueHD/DTS-HD master audio, essentially all available audio options are supported

Heavy-duty cool metal enclosure protects the insides and keeps the unit cool by aiding in quick heat absorption and dissipation. We recommend using this splitter with HDMI cables that are 30 feet or shorter and of excellent quality.
Compact in size and easy plug & play installation, HDCP 2.2 Compliant

name: avedio links HDMI Splitter 4K@60Hz, HDMI Splitter 1 in 2 Out-Not Extended Display(Only Mirror Screens), Support 3D Dol-by Vision Atmos HDMI2.0b, HDCP2.2, 18.5Gbps, Auto Downscaling, Full HD 1080P
short_description: HDMI 2.0 b Splitter 1 in 2 Out - Mirror Only(Not Extend): avedio links HDMI 1 in 2 out Splitter 4K@60Hz can duplicate 1 HDMI input video signal to 2 HDMI display (TV, monitor, projector etc), mirror video and audio simultaneously without any loss

Not Support: 1.Not Extend,it not extend separate content to 2 monitors; 2.Not a switcher, it not support connect two HDMI input signal to one monitor; 3.Not a audio extractor, not support connect to any audio device like sound-bar; 4.Not support ARC/eARC;5.Not support CEC

Auto Down Scaler:1x2 HDMI splitter support mix 4K & 1080p display output; Support auto or forced downscale; Not support downscale from 4Kx2K@60Hz 4:2:2 to 1080P; it support UHD 4Kx2K@60Hz RGB 4:4:4, 1080P/60Hz/120Hz,deep color 30/36bit,18.5Gbps bandwidth; advise use HDMI 2.0 AWG 26 cable, for 4K output, cable length ≤16ft; for 1080P output, cable length ≤32.8ft

Compatibility and Application: 2 Way HDMI splitter can connect various HDMI devices like TV, projector, monitor,STB, DVD,PC,PS3/4/5...; Solutions for home entertainment, presentation, event, education, and digital signage, enhancing viewing and engagement

Packing: 1x avedio links HDMI splitter 4K@60Hz, 1x USB cable with power adapter, 1x 4ft HDMI 2.0 cable; This 1x 2 HDMI splitter is easy to set up—simply connect your HDMI devices and power adapter to effortlessly share stunning video with friends/family

name: OREI HDMI Splitter 1 in 4 Out – 4K@30Hz HDMI 2.0 Splitter with HDCP 1.4, EDID Management, and LPCM/Dolby/DTS Audio Support–Compact Plug & Play Design
short_description: Splits 1 HDMI input signal into 4 identical HDMI output signals, perfect for simultaneous display on multiple screens.
Handles resolutions up to 4K@30Hz, 1080p, 720p, and more, making it ideal for high-definition video setups.
Supports LPCM, Dolby-AC3, DTS7.1, DSD, Dolby TrueHD, and DTS-HD master audio for an immersive audio experience.
Fully compliant with HDCP 1.4 for secure signal transmission, ensuring compatibility with modern devices and content.
Compact size with an easy setup process, ensuring hassle-free usage without the need for additional configuration.

name: J-Tech Digital HDMI Splitter 1 in 2 Out 4K 60Hz Multi-Resolution Output (MRO) HDMI 2.0 Splitter Supports Downscale HDR HDR10 / Dolby Vision 4K@60Hz 4:4:4 HDCP2.3 2.2 (JTECH-4KSP2)
short_description: 𝟏 𝐇𝐃𝐌𝐈 𝐈𝐍𝐏𝐔𝐓 𝐓𝐎 𝟐 𝐇𝐃𝐌𝐈 𝐎𝐔𝐓𝐏𝐔𝐓𝐒 - This affordable 1 x 2 HDMI splitter allows users to split one HDMI input signal (from cable/satellite box, DVD/Blu-ray player, PC, Apple TV, Roku, XBox, Fire TV and others) so they can send it to two HDMI output displays simultaneously.
𝐌𝐈𝐗 𝐃𝐈𝐅𝐅𝐄𝐑𝐄𝐍𝐓 𝐃𝐈𝐒𝐏𝐋𝐀𝐘 𝐑𝐄𝐒𝐎𝐋𝐔𝐓𝐈𝐎𝐍𝐒 - A Multi-Resolution Output (MRO) feature lets users send a compatible HDMI signal to output displays with different resolutions.
𝐒𝐔𝐏𝐏𝐎𝐑𝐓𝐒 𝐀𝐋𝐋 𝐇𝐃 𝐀𝐔𝐃𝐈𝐎 𝐅𝐎𝐑𝐌𝐀𝐓𝐒 - Supports all HD audio formats, including PCM, Dolby Digital, Dolby True HD, Dolby Atmos, DTS, DTS HD, DTS: X and Dolby Digital +.
𝐇𝐃𝐌𝐈 𝟐.𝟎 𝐒𝐓𝐀𝐍𝐃𝐀𝐑𝐃 𝐇𝐃𝐑 𝟏𝟎 & 𝐄𝐃𝐈𝐃 𝐂𝐎𝐏𝐘 𝐀𝐁𝐈𝐋𝐈𝐓𝐈𝐄𝐒 - Supports 18Gbps bandwidth, resolutions up to 4K@60Hz 4:4:4, HDR 10 and Dolby Vision HDCP 2.3 Compliant. EDID Copy priority is Output 1> Output 2.

𝐅𝐑𝐄𝐄 𝐋𝐈𝐅𝐄-𝐓𝐈𝐌𝐄 𝐒𝐔𝐏𝐏𝐎𝐑𝐓 - All J-Tech Digital Products include a One-Year Manufacturer Warranty and free lifetime technical support from our Customer Support Team located in Houston, Texas – Available M-F 9AM-6PM CST.

name: Anker HDMI Switch, 4K@60Hz HDMI Switcher, 4 in 1 Out with Smooth Finish, Supports HDR, 3D, Dolby, DTS, Compatible with Laptops, PC, Xbox, Projector (Charger and Remote Control Batteries Not Included)
short_description: 4-in-1 HDMI Switch: Expand one HDMI output into four inputs, offering you the freedom to connect more devices and switch between them without hassle. (This product does not support the HDMI CEC feature.)
Effortless Switching: Equipped with an intuitive remote control and one-click functionality, enjoy seamless transitions between devices, for stress-free entertainment and work.
4K Clarity Switch: Don't just watch; immerse yourself with ultra-high-definition quality for crystal-clear, vibrant visuals every time.
Power-Packed Performance: Delivering ample power for stable signals, this HDMI ensures a smooth, uninterrupted streaming experience—ideal for both work and play.

What You Get: Anker HDMI Switch (4 in 1 Out, 4K HDMI), 5 ft (1.5 m) USB-A to USB-C charging cable (HDMI Cables not included), remote control, safety guide with user manual, 18-month warranty, and our friendly customer service.
